info.name: Zee complete list of my styles [merci]
info.description:
A "null" style [the code does nothing] -- just a list of all my styles [as of 20Sep2012], current and "obsolete", provided "as is" (in case you might find some pieces of code in them to be useful)...

[ style 70358 ]
info.additionalInfo: Note: a few of the [obsolete] styles have screenshots posted with them that have nothing to do with the style itself but are being referenced in the descriptions of some other styles (just wanted to keep all style-related images "onsite").
